function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lower quality green space in poorer communities","Impact":"Exposure to health risks, reduced access to benefits of green space","Mitigation":"Improving the quality of green space, increasing access to well-maintained green spaces","Technologies":"Green space monitoring technology, maintenance equipment","People":"Communities in lower socio-economic status","Owner":"Local government, urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of benefits from poorly maintained large parks","Impact":"Reduced delivery of positives associated with green space","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of large parks","Technologies":"Park maintenance equipment, park monitoring technology","People":"Surrounding population of large parks","Owner":"Local government, park management authority"},{"Description":"Assumption of benefits from proximity to parks","Impact":"Misjudgment of the benefits acquired from green space","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of well-maintained green space, utilization of green space quality assessments","Technologies":"Green space quality assessment tools, community education platforms","People":"Urban planners, community leaders","Owner":"Urban planning agencies, community organizations"}]}
